inclusion.criterion: mitral regurgitation and mitral valve prolapse
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: elective mitral valve repair by an experienced surgeon
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to perform leaflet resection or preservation strategy
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has severe mitral regurgitation and mitral valve prolapse, but also has significant LV dysfunction (LVEF < 40%).
